name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D Showcase】 Yes, a squirrel can be an Idol, too #AyundaRisu3D【Ayunda Risu ⧸ hololive ID 】 [VxnwBm49egM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Ayunda Risu and Aragami Oga perform the 'Hara-pan' dance.
MC section where Risu thanks Oga for appearing and they discuss their height difference and a future 'World Domination Movie'.
Risu reflects on the showcase so far and admires the virtual cherry blossom scenery in English and Japanese.
Risu begins her performance of the song 'flos'.

subtitles.original: はらぱん ぱんぱんぱん...
subtitles.english: Hara-pan pan-pan-pan...

subtitles.original: はぁー、はらぱん はらぱん したね。
subtitles.english: Phew, that was quite a "Hara-pan" dance.

subtitles.original: はらぱん 凄かったよね。
subtitles.english: The "Hara-pan" was amazing, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: 楽しかったね。
subtitles.english: It was fun.

subtitles.original: 楽しかった、いやー。
subtitles.english: It was fun, indeed.

subtitles.original: あのね、私の3D配信に来てくれてありがとう。
subtitles.english: You know, thank you so much for coming to my 3D showcase.

subtitles.original: すごく楽しかった。
subtitles.english: It was a lot of fun.

subtitles.original: 今から、本当にありがとうございました、本当に。
subtitles.english: I'm truly grateful for everything, really.

subtitles.original: でもね、やっとね、3Dなれて。
subtitles.english: But you know, you're finally in 3D.

subtitles.original: こうやってお披露目できて。
subtitles.english: And being able to have this showcase.

subtitles.original: 本当に良かったなと思います。
subtitles.english: I think it's truly wonderful.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、おがしゃんと今日は、あとね、3分ぐらい喋れって言われた今。
subtitles.english: Well, today with Oga-shan... Wait, I was just told we have about 3 more minutes to talk.

subtitles.original: また遊ぶ、これあげる。
subtitles.english: Let's play again. Here, have this.

subtitles.original: いや、まだね、もうちょっと喋れるんだって、どうする？
subtitles.english: No, apparently we can still talk for a bit longer. What should we do?

subtitles.original: もらっちゃったけど、ポーズ？ポーズ取る？
subtitles.english: I received it, but... a pose? Should we strike a pose?

subtitles.original: はぁー！すごい！
subtitles.english: Waaah! Amazing!

subtitles.original: 待って待って。
subtitles.english: Wait, wait.

subtitles.original: どうする？どんなポーズ取る？
subtitles.english: What now? What kind of pose should we do?

subtitles.original: 可愛いよね。
subtitles.english: It's cute, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 私も可愛いよ。
subtitles.english: I'm cute too!

subtitles.original: そうだね、リスちゃんも可愛いね。
subtitles.english: That's true, you're cute too, Risu-chan.

subtitles.original: ほら、お尻こんな感じ。
subtitles.english: Look, the butt looks like this.

subtitles.original: お尻、お尻、お尻。
subtitles.english: Butt, butt, butt.

subtitles.original: リスちゃんも尻尾ふわふわでいいね。
subtitles.english: Your tail is so fluffy and nice too, Risu-chan.

subtitles.original: おがしゃん尻尾欲しい。
subtitles.english: Oga-shan, you want a tail?

subtitles.original: 尻尾ね、ちょっと欲しいか、つくかなこれ？
subtitles.english: A tail... I guess I want one. I wonder if it'll attach?

subtitles.original: 可愛い。
subtitles.english: Cute.

subtitles.original: 可愛いこれ。リスちゃん嫌がってないこれ？大好き？
subtitles.english: This is cute. Risu-chan, you don't hate this, do you? Are you okay?

subtitles.original: なんか、なんだよ！
subtitles.english: Like, what the heck!

subtitles.original: あー、そうか、リスちゃん小さいね。
subtitles.english: Ah, I see, you're really small, Risu-chan.

subtitles.original: 私ほんとに小さいね。
subtitles.english: I'm really small, aren't I?

subtitles.original: おがしゃんは本当に高いんですけど。
subtitles.english: But you're really tall, Oga-shan.

subtitles.original: ほら、ホロスターズ一でかいからな。
subtitles.english: Well, I am the biggest in Holostars, after all.

subtitles.original: どれぐらい高いんですか？
subtitles.english: How tall are you?

subtitles.original: えーとね、192センチから200メートルまで大きくなります。
subtitles.english: Well, I'm 192cm, but I can grow up to 200 meters.

subtitles.original: あれ、怖いじゃん。
subtitles.english: Wait, that's scary.

subtitles.original: ビルよりでかくなれるから。
subtitles.english: Because I can become taller than a building.

subtitles.original: おがビル。
subtitles.english: Oga-Building.

subtitles.original: でもなんか不思議な感じするな、リスちゃんとこうやって3Dで並んでると。
subtitles.english: But it feels strange, standing next to you like this in 3D.

subtitles.original: あのね、3Dもらったら、映画、映画作る。
subtitles.english: You know, now that I have 3D, I'm going to make a movie.

subtitles.original: 映画？ムービー作る？
subtitles.english: A movie? You're making a film?

subtitles.original: あの、ワールド・ドミネーション・ムービー？
subtitles.english: That "World Domination Movie"?

subtitles.original: そうそう。
subtitles.english: Yes, yes.

subtitles.original: いいね、是非とも一緒に撮ろう。
subtitles.english: Nice. Let's definitely film it together.

subtitles.original: おがは、えっと何だろう、魔神、なんか。
subtitles.english: Oga is... let's see, a demon or something.

subtitles.original: 何だろう、でかいものって何だっけ？名前？
subtitles.english: What's that giant thing called? The name?

subtitles.original: 何だろう、巨人？
subtitles.english: What could it be? A giant?

subtitles.original: 巨人。魔神の巨人になる。
subtitles.english: A giant. You'll be the Demon Giant.

subtitles.original: そして街にぶわぁーって。
subtitles.english: And then go "Bwah!" through the city.

subtitles.original: わかりました。じゃあ、一緒に今度ムービー撮りましょう。
subtitles.english: Understood. Let's film a movie together next time.

subtitles.original: これ可愛い。私なんか一回ぬいぐるみ欲しい。
subtitles.english: This is cute. I want one of these plushies for myself.

subtitles.original: でもね、それもう家帰りたいって言ってるから。
subtitles.english: But you know, this one says it already wants to go home.

subtitles.original: あ、これあげる。
subtitles.english: Ah, here, have this.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、こちらの二つは見てる皆さんにプレゼントするかもしれません。
subtitles.english: Then, these two might be given away as presents to the viewers.

subtitles.original: というわけで、今日楽しかった。ありがとね。
subtitles.english: Anyway, it was fun today. Thanks.

subtitles.original: またね、バイバイ！
subtitles.english: See you later, bye-bye!

subtitles.original: バイバイね。
subtitles.english: Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: 楽しかった。
subtitles.english: That was fun.

subtitles.original: That was... that was really crazy.
subtitles.english: That was... that was really crazy.

subtitles.original: That was really fun, it's...
subtitles.english: That was really fun, it's...

subtitles.original: I can't really imagine that it's actually happening right now.
subtitles.english: I can't really imagine that it's actually happening right now.

subtitles.original: 凄い。はらぱんぱんぱん。
subtitles.english: Amazing. Hara-pan-pan-pan.

subtitles.original: And then we're going to look at the scenery a little bit more.
subtitles.english: And then we're going to look at the scenery a little bit more.

subtitles.original: I'm sorry because there was an evil being before.
subtitles.english: I'm sorry because there was an evil being before.

subtitles.original: There's a lot of flowers and the...
subtitles.english: There's a lot of flowers and the...

subtitles.original: the look is pretty aesthetic.
subtitles.english: the look is pretty aesthetic.

subtitles.original: And yeah, there's a lot of pretty flowers.
subtitles.english: And yeah, there's a lot of pretty flowers.

subtitles.original: 綺麗ですね。
subtitles.english: It's beautiful, isn't it?

subtitles.original: Daphne
subtitles.english: Daphne

subtitles.original: Ficus
subtitles.english: Ficus

subtitles.original: Iris
subtitles.english: Iris

subtitles.original: Maackia
subtitles.english: Maackia

subtitles.original: Lythrum
subtitles.english: Lythrum

subtitles.original: Myrica
subtitles.english: Myrica

subtitles.original: Sabia
subtitles.english: Sabia

subtitles.original: flos
subtitles.english: flos

subtitles.original:
flos
Lyrics / Composition: R Sound Design
subtitles.english:
flos
Lyrics / Composition: R Sound Design

subtitles.original: 拝啓僕の願った未来よ
subtitles.english: Dear future that I wished for

subtitles.original: 絶え間ない後悔よ
subtitles.english: Relentless regret

subtitles.original: 体感八度五分の夢は
subtitles.english: The dream of a 38.5 degree fever

subtitles.original: やがて散ってしまった
subtitles.english: Has eventually scattered away
